reviewText: I haven't even seen this chopped-up version. But they shouldn't have issued a half-baked DVD like this when everybody is waiting for the real thing. Please reissue the DVD with the full-length movie!
Be aware, this version has a run time of 115 minutes. The full version is 242 minutes and the cut video version is 150 minutes. I can't see the logic behind this considering this is a DVD.
